attributes.action: put the brakes on liberalisation of film censorship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every generation recognises that films of all genre have become more explicit and increasingly available to all ages.
Films like Saw IV would not have been shown in mainstream cinemas until quite recently. Let the society we want be reflected by our media.  Protect future generations from this downward spiral of gratuitous violence for a kinder society.
